description: Tandoori Chicken USA Mobile is the brainchild of Chef Bobby Mahal. Bobby is a U.C. Berkeley graduate with a deep passion for food. His family has been serving the Bay Area for over 20 years with the motto of serving authentic Indian food with the freshest ingredients.We bring to you authentic Indian dishes such as Chicken Curry, Butter Chicken, Season Vegetable Curries, Mango Lassi to TC USA exclusives such as TC Bites, TC Pakores, TC USA Chicken Sandwich, and TC USA Paneer Sandwich.Regularly Bobby will throw a surprise curve ball creating an off the wall Indian dish such as Butter Chicken French Fries and Mango Lassi Popsicles.
name: Tandoori Chicken USA Mobile
